name: Port Jefferson
text:

The 2:03PM train from Huntington due Penn at 3:07PM is delayed near Cold Spring Harbor due to slippery rail conditions - where train wheels slip while accelerating, or slide during braking - caused by oily residue left by crushed leaves on the rails. See attached link for info on how we combat slippery rail conditions.Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Â

name: Ronkonkoma
text:
Planned Work

11/18-19:Â  Buses Replace Weekend Trains between Ronkonkoma & Hicksville; Greenport Departure Times Altered


What's happening?
Buses will replace trains between Ronkonkoma and Hicksville on Saturday, November 18 and Sunday, November 19 to accommodate switch installation work. Busing will begin at 12:48 AM on Saturday morning and continue through 12:46 AM Monday morning. Service will be affected as follows:


Westbound


  • Customers at stations Ronkonkoma through Pinelawn will board buses to Hicksville, then transfer to westbound trains. Buses will depart up to 44 minutes earlier than normal train times.

  • The 10:05 AM, 11:05 AM, 12:05 PM trains from Ronkonkoma are canceled.

  • Farmingdale and Bethpage customers will board their normally scheduled trains.

  • Greenport customers will board buses at Ronkonkoma for service to Hicksville, where train service will resume.Â 


Eastbound


  • Customers traveling to stations Pinelawn through Ronkonkoma will board a bus at Hicksville to complete their trip. Please plan for up to 44 minutes of additional travel time.

  • The 4:39 PM, 5:39 PM and 6:39 PM trains from Penn Station are canceled.

  • Bethpage and Farmingdale customers should stay on the train to their station.

  • Customers traveling to stations Medford, Yaphank, Riverhead, Mattituck, Southold & Greenport will board connecting trains from Penn Station one hour earlier than usual at 8:12 AM & 1:12 PM (instead of 9:12 AM & 2:12 PM).Â  At Hicksville, customers will connect with buses to Ronkonkoma, where eastbound train service resumes.



    • For additional information, pick up a copy of the special Ronkonkoma Branch Timetable, dated November 18 & 19, 2017, or view the special timetable at: https://goo.gl/JuuTiK


    Â

name: Danbury
text:
Service Change  Posted: 11/17/2017  8:57PM

Substitute bus service will be provided between Danbury and South Norwalk for select trains, Fri., Nov. 17, and all day Sat. and Sun., Nov. 18-19, to accommodate track work. See schedule at http://ow.ly/otHY30gkOO0 Buses will operate up to 20 minutes earlier than scheduled trains. Check Local or Express bus service to your destination while boarding. We appreciate your patience during this infrastructure improvement on the Danbury Branch.
